remarks: Define the set of all hyperplanes of a left module or left vector space.  Also called co-atoms, these are subspaces that are one dimension less that the full space.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jun-2014.)
statement:
df-lshyp $p |- LSHyp = ( w e. _V |-> { s e. ( LSubSp ` w ) | ( s =/= ( Base ` w ) /\ E. v e. ( Base ` w ) ( ( LSpan ` w ) ` ( s u. { v } ) ) = ( Base ` w ) ) } ) $.
$d s v w $.
